snippet: Chelsea forward Bertrand Traore has moved to Ajax on a season-long loan for an undisclosed fee, the Premier League side confirmed on Friday....

headline.main: Chelsea Forward Traore Moves to Ajax on Loan
headline.print_headline: Chelsea Forward Traore Moves to Ajax on Loan

lead_paragraph: Chelsea forward Bertrand Traore has moved to Ajax on a season-long loan for an undisclosed fee, the Premier League side confirmed on Friday.

snippet: Chelsea and Tottenham Hotspur have been handed heavy fines for failing to control their players during an ill-tempered Premier League match this month, the FA said on Monday....
lead_paragraph: Chelsea and Tottenham Hotspur have been handed heavy fines for failing to control their players during an ill-tempered Premier League match this month, the FA said on Monday.

snippet: Liverpool have completed the loan signing of defender Steven Caulker from Championship side Queens Park Rangers, the Premier League club said on their website (www.liverpoolfc.com)....

headline.main: Caulker Signs for Liverpool on Loan
headline.print_headline: Caulker Signs for Liverpool on Loan

lead_paragraph: Liverpool have completed the loan signing of defender Steven Caulker from Championship side Queens Park Rangers, the Premier League club said on their website (www.liverpoolfc.com).

snippet: Newcastle United and Norwich City were relegated from the Premier League after Sunderland beat Everton 3-0 on Wednesday....

headline.main: Newcastle and Norwich Relegated After Sunderland Win
headline.print_headline: Newcastle and Norwich Relegated After Sunderland Win

lead_paragraph: Newcastle United and Norwich City were relegated from the Premier League after Sunderland beat Everton 3-0 on Wednesday.

snippet: Brad Smith scored in the 73rd minute to give visiting Liverpool, an English Premier League team, a 2-2 draw with fourth-tier Exeter in the F.A. Cup....
abstract: Liverpool ties Exeter, 2-2, in third-round of soccer's FA Cup; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: Brad Smith scored in the 73rd minute to give visiting Liverpool, an English Premier League team, a 2-2 draw with fourth-tier Exeter in the F.A. Cup.

snippet: Chelsea manager Guus Hiddink has urged doctors at the Football Association (FA) and Premier League clubs to stand up against English football's gruelling fixture list....

headline.main: Hiddink Urges Doctors to Challenge Packed Fixture List
headline.print_headline: Hiddink Urges Doctors to Challenge Packed Fixture List

lead_paragraph: Chelsea manager Guus Hiddink has urged doctors at the Football Association (FA) and Premier League clubs to stand up against English football's gruelling fixture list.

snippet: Italian Walter Mazzarri will manage Watford in the English Premier League next season after the club confirmed the former Inter Milan coach as the replacement for Quique Sanchez Flores on Saturday....

headline.main: Watford Confirm Mazzarri as New Manager
headline.print_headline: Watford Confirm Mazzarri as New Manager

lead_paragraph: Italian Walter Mazzarri will manage Watford in the English Premier League next season after the club confirmed the former Inter Milan coach as the replacement for Quique Sanchez Flores on Saturday.

snippet: Swansea City are in talks with U.S. investors about a potential takeover and hope to reach agreement on the deal by the end of the season....

headline.main: Swansea in Talks With American Investors on Takeover Deal
headline.print_headline: Swansea in Talks With American Investors on Takeover Deal

lead_paragraph: Swansea City are in talks with U.S. investors about a potential takeover and hope to reach agreement on the deal by the end of the season.

snippet: Facts and figures ahead of Saturday's Premier League match between Tottenham Hotspur and Leicester City at White Hart Lane....
lead_paragraph: Facts and figures ahead of Saturday's Premier League match between Tottenham Hotspur and Leicester City at White Hart Lane.

snippet: Alan Pardew has been sacked as Crystal Palace manager, the Premier League club said on Thursday, with former England boss Sam Allardyce appearing poised to take over....

headline.main: Allardyce Tipped to Succeed Sacked Pardew at Palace
headline.print_headline: Allardyce Tipped to Succeed Sacked Pardew at Palace

lead_paragraph: Alan Pardew has been sacked as Crystal Palace manager, the Premier League club said on Thursday, with former England boss Sam Allardyce appearing poised to take over.
